message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit out of my price range. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I can do $105, which is the lowest I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95.  What do you think?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $95 and $105, so I can offer it to you for $100. What do you think?
Alice, I'm really close to my limit, but I can't go above $90.  Let's make a deal at $90 and I'll take the product off your hands.
